statements: SELECT * FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE billing_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM BillingAndPayments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BillingAndPayments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, amount FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM BillingAndPayments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT billing_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BillingAndPayments GROUP BY billing_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE customer_id = 456 AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM billing_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_payment FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM billing_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM billing_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING transaction_count > 2;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM billing_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING average_amount > 50;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM billing_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH;
SELECT * FROM billing ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM payment WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_method FROM payment WHERE payment_method LIKE '%Card';
SELECT id, type, description FROM transaction_log WHERE type = 'payment';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) FROM payment GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 500 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM transaction_log WHERE type = 'refund' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT billing.customer_id, payment.customer_id FROM billing INNER JOIN payment ON billing.customer_id = payment.customer_id ORDER BY billing.customer_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM billing;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(invoice_id) AS total_invoices FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_invoices > 5 ORDER BY total_invoices DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT customer_name, invoice_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id
SELECT method_name, description FROM payment_methods
